post.body: we're on Facebook too!
I'm sure Rex's year of love was cherished and appreciated
are you looking for a local calendar?
http://tinyurl.com/4ygjpu has some good advanced Twitter tips
what's your facebook URL, @angieslist?
http://tinyurl.com/6ov98u/pages/Indianapolis-IN/Humane-Society-of-Indianapolis/37182868939
LOL @Pres_BHarrison! you could've adopted some rat terriers to help ;)
Want an athletic, smart dog to spend time with? Winnie is our stray of the day! http://tinyurl.com/5o7tyl
At least you didn't have something like a tiger as a pet, @Pres_BHarrison. That would probably be the first thing people remembered about u!
at least people don't bark fast when leaving messages, @indamy66 - that can be REALLY hard to understand
thanks, @lllittlefield!
nice song bout social media, @colinaclark - I'm sure it made a lot of powncers cry tears of digital sorrow :P
This Mutt Strut will be our 3rd, @WTHRcom, with our three furry family members :) Actually, counting all of my family, 5 dogs strut together
we can't wait for Mutt Strut either, @WTHRcom! What a fun time.
If you like kitties, Indy Feral has an awesome cat calendar benefitting TNR: http://tinyurl.com/62v2dp
If you like pit bulls, Bad Rap has two different '09 calendars http://www.cafepress.com/badrapstore/53863
Still have holiday shopping to do? Or shopping for yourself? Shop & give at the same time! http://www.petgive.com/moreinfo/pghome/b1a148440
Sugar's our stray of the day - what a cute kitty! http://tinyurl.com/5o7tyl
you can also vote for HSI to win $25,000 for our animals at http://tinyurl.com/3j3rj2
there are a LOT of PetGive.com retailers who donate a portion of your purchase to nonprofit animal welfare groups like HSI
still have Christmas shopping? use PetGive.com to donate to your favorite animal charity: http://www.petgive.com/moreinfo/pghome/b1a148440
Thanks for helping out with the donated supplies to HSI, @perl_girl! Friends and furry folks like yourself are a huge help to our animals!
Celebrating the adoption of 5 of our 12 Strays of Christmas! Yay!!! http://tinyurl.com/57palj
looking forward to more families coming in tonight and tomorrow to get adoption certificates for puppies and kitties!
